TopicTitle: Apollo 7 inside capsule, real footage based

Articles.Content:
This is a real footage based interior view of Apollo 7 from launch to splashdown.  It was meticulously processed and modestly enhanced with sound based on real sensor data short of actual microphones.  Outstanding

 

The creator also put many informative captions and explanations of indicators and switches and their relevance, or nonrelevance, throughout the flight
